QuestData.Title: The Hatchery Must Burn
QuestData.Description: $n! Choluna spoke true: the goddess has returned! A miracle in our midst.$B$BWhile you were able to kill the twilight dragon Sethria, we have not yet located all of the eggs that the harpies had delivered to her. Thisalee and I have tracked them to a great hatchery constructed within the Firelands. It is not of this realm, so Aviana cannot accompany you.$B$BFly south and enter the flamegate in the center of the valley. Farden Talonshrike has been sent ahead and will be waiting for you within.
QuestData.LogDescription: Travel through the flamegate in the center of the Flamewake in Mount Hyjal. Speak with Farden Talonshrike once you are inside.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Travel through the flamegate in the center of the Flamewake in Mount Hyjal. Speak with Farden Talonshrike once you are inside.
QuestData.RewardText: So it's true - Aviana has returned, with you as her herald.$B$BThere's much to be done here. We are deep in the heart of the Firelands. Sethria smuggled stolen eggs from Mount Hyjal here to hatch her own hideous creations - birds of prey, trained for war.$B$BI hope you're ready to fight back!
